divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside in the back (8:23pm), looked up and saw a red bright sphere like shape moving very slow so I thought it was a plane or jet, not even a second it just move down fast and then right back to the same spot, so I ran to get my wife and son to see it, so we went into the front yard and the thing was moving like up and down side to side but in the same spot,then we noteice that it move to the left and stoped and sped off far to the same spot but farther away then vanished.(8:29) now here the werid part, I have a picture I took 3 years ago Feb.14 2009 I have send aswell. same area the ones in the picture are not red ones.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: red sphere shape with red inner orb like center.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
